A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Uninteresting and forces new characters into the story with little explanation. Vice admiral holdo is apparently leia's best friend but she's never been seen before this film for an hour at max. The plot also makes no sense since the first order super carrier could just release one of the six star destroyers it carries to jump to Hyperspace and pinch the resistance into a corner. Nothing makes sense about this film logically.
